scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run start:dev --prefix services/user_services" "npm run start:dev --prefix services/store_services" "npm run start:dev --prefix services/payment_services"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:prod --prefix services/user_services" "npm run start:prod --prefix services/store_services" "npm run start:prod --prefix services/payment_services"
